body.p:
Head Quarters 13th U S Infantry
Newport Barracks Ky
July 18th 1864
Sir:
I have the honor to enclose herewith a Consolidated Tri Monthly report of men enlisted into the 13th Infantry (Regular Army) from the State of Kentucky from the 1st to the 10th of July 1864.

I am, Sir,
Very Respectfully,
Your Obdt Servant
Ferd. E. de Courcey
1st Lieut and Adjt 13th Infantry
Acting Supt Regtl Rectg Service

To his Excellency
The Governor of the State of Kentucky
Frankfort Ky.

13
Newport Ky
July 18 1864
De Courcy Ferd E,
Sends Tri-Monthly Report of men mustered into Regular Army from Ky from July 1st to 10th 1864.
